name: SUPER SIMPLE RACER
description:
SUPER SIMPLE RACER is a super simple race game.

You are the red dot. In your imagination this could be a hot and fast sportscar. And the black square is a race track.

The race begins with a mouse click. And with every click your red sports car changes the direction in steps of 90 degrees.

Race as long as possible without touching the black walls!

***

SUPER SIMPLE RACE is for free. But if you like it, feel free to donate a small amount.
